Chanderi

Teal Green Chanderi Silk Saree

₹2,699

Graceful handblock printed Bagru print pure Chanderi saree, paired with a matching blouse for an elegant ethnic look.

Description

Product Details: Fabric: Pure Chanderi Design: Traditional handblock Bagru print Saree Length: 5.5 meters Blouse Piece: 1 meter (unstitched) Texture: Lightweight with a subtle sheen Occasion: Festive wear, casual elegance, cultural events

Care Instructions

Dry clean recommended to preserve the handblock print If hand washing, use mild detergent and cold water Wash separately to avoid color transfer Do not soak or scrub Dry in shade Iron on low heat, preferably on the reverse side
